import React, {useEffect} from "react"; import ScoreList from "./scoreList"; const Score = () => { //scores는 state 값, setScore은 함수. const [scores, setScore] = React.useState(0); console.log(ScoreList.scoreEach) useEffect(() => { const newArray = Math.floor(Math.random() * 6); setScore(newArray) }, []) return ( <> { (scores === 1)?
{scores}
: (scores === 2)?
{scores}
: (scores === 3)?
{scores}
: (scores === 4)?
: (scores === 5)?
:
} ) } export default Score;
